reviewText: It was my fault that I did not pay attention!!  I thought this product "Night Court" was with Harry Anderson.  However, since I am into True Crime or True Cases, I decided to keep the product.
Wrong product ordered.  I sent it back.  The company did well and I would use them again.  Product sent in timely maner.
As far as getting the product on time was fine but my mistake of ordering the wrong one. I sent them back and hope to hear back from the seller soon.

I'm so disappointed that those dvd doesn't have any Closed Caption or Subittled for the deaf and hard of hearing. Remember that over 25 millions of deaf and hard of hearing people live in this America!
If you are looking for the TV sitcom starring Harry Anderson, John Laroquette, et.al., this is not it. Here is the correct one: Night Court - The Complete First Season

Feels like I was ripped off. This is a sleazy reality show from the dinosaur days of TV it has NOTHING to do with the beloved Night Court of Harry,Bull and Dan. Money and time WASTED. I wish I could give it minus stars.
not the night court with the tall balled guy in it.and the goof-fey judge
I ordered this by mistake, .. thinking it was the old TV show, "Night Court"....  I did not take the time to watch it.
I loved this series, and it only gets better as I re-watch it again. This was good writing and the Charactors really hit their stride in the 3rd season.
Great shows
I ordered it as a gift expecting the comedy for my sister.  OOPS.  My mistake
I returned this item because it wasn't what I thought.  This is not the series with Harry Anderson and Markie Post.
stunk on ice
BEST GIFT EVER GAVE WITH SUCH CLEAN HUMOR SHAME THEY DON'T HAVE MORE OF
I wanted the tv series night court. That is what I was looking for. You have done this to me before.
